title: C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming language. This course covers:- Basic syntax- Variables and data types- Control structures- Functions- Pointers- Memory management

title: Java Programming
description: Master Java programming and build real-world applications. This course includes- Object-oriented programming- Exception handling- GUI development- Multithreading- Database connectivity

title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
description: Explore the principles of OOP and design patterns. Topics covered Inheritance Polymorphism Encapsulation Abstraction Singleton pattern Factory pattern

title: Data Structures (DS)
description: Learn about common data structures and their applications. Course content Arrays Linked lists Stacks and queues  Trees Hashing Sorting algorithms .common data structures

title: Algorithms
description: Master algorithms and problem-solving techniques. Topics include: Algorithm analysis, Searching algorithms, Graph algorithms, Dynamic programming, Greedy algorithms, NP-completeness

title: HTML5 Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of HTML5 for web development. Covered concepts: HTML structure, Semantic elements, Forms and input, Multimedia integration, HTML5 APIs, Responsive design

title: CSS Styling
description: Master CSS for designing beautiful websites. Topics covered: CSS selectors, Box model, Layout techniques, CSS animations, CSS frameworks, Cross-browser compatibility

title: JavaScript Essentials
description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript programming. Course includes: Variables and data types, Control structures, Functions, DOM manipulation, Event handling, AJAX

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Create mobile-friendly websites using responsive design techniques. Course covers: Media queries, Flexbox, CSS Grid, Mobile-first approach, Testing and optimization, Bootstrap framework
